duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform jewelry repair, cleaning, soldering, and sizing in a manufacturing facility.
Design custom jewelry and restore jewelry to its original beauty.
Deliver a Customer-First experience that exceeds customers’ expectations for custom jewelry design and repairs.
Use various tools and techniques to make jewelry from metals, diamonds, gems, and other materials.
Identify areas that need repair and ensure smooth surfaces and consistent ring thickness throughout.
Complete bench tests for assessment purposes.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma/GED required, technical training in metal or jewelry programs preferred.
